ns0:Process.ows:Title: fetch RSG_MODIS_zg_1daycomp datetime availables thredds data server
ns0:Process.ows:Abstract: WPS that parses RSG_MODIS_zg_1daycomp_AGGSLOW descriveCoverage for chlor_a and outputs the available timestamps

ns0:Process.ows:Title: fetch RSG_MODIS_zg_1daycomp from thredds data server
ns0:Process.ows:Abstract: Process that fetches the desired RSG_MODIS_zg_1daycomp layer data and returns it as GeoTiff. Data Available from 2011-05-01 till 2011-11-02. Use the fetchMODISTimeStamp to get list of dateTimes avalilable

ns0:Process.ows:Title: fetchMRCS layer from thredds data server
ns0:Process.ows:Abstract: Process that fetches the desired MRCS layer data and returns it as GeoTiff

ns0:Process.ows:Title: Creates/modifies the color table associated with a raster map.
reproject coordinates
ns0:Process.ows:Abstract: reprojectCoords uses gdaltransform to reproject a list of coordinates from one projection to another. DataInputs example using 3 UK points in lat/long to UTM 30N e.g: '[coords=http://rsg.pml.ac.uk/wps/testdata/coords.txt;outputSRS=EPSG:32630;inputSRS=EPSG:4326]'

ns0:Process.ows:Title: intersection between 2 bounding boxex
ns0:Process.ows:Abstract: intersectBBOX calculates the intersection between 2 bounding boxes

ns0:Process.ows:Title: reproject image
ns0:Process.ows:Abstract: Reproject an image to a new projection. If outputResolution is specified then the image will be scaled to the new resolution. If outputHeight or outputWidth are specified then the image will be scaled to the new dimensions Data values to be ignored by the interpolation are specified in the NoData list. E.g: 'datainputs=[inputImage=http://rsg.pml.ac.uk/wps/testdata/elev_srtm_30m.img;outputSRS=EPSG:4326]' and with imageOutput as reference e.g: 'responsedocument=outputImage=@asreference=true'

ns0:Process.ows:Title: combine 2 image with identical grid into a single multiband GeoTIFF
ns0:Process.ows:Abstract: combine 2 image with identical grid into a single multiband GeoTIFF

ns0:Process.ows:Title: compare 2 images
ns0:Process.ows:Abstract: Compare image runs a predefined statistical comparison on the 2 input images

ns0:Process.ows:Title: L4 and E1 Chr-a graphic with metoffice MRCS data
ns0:Process.ows:Abstract: L4 and E1 fluroescence data obtained from WFS (http://rsg.pml.ac.uk/geoserver/wfs) and MRCS chr-a (http://rsg.pml.ac.uk/thredds/catalog/metoffice_mrcs/catalog.html) raster model data for buoy location

ns0:Process.ows:Title: Dummy Process
ns0:Process.ows:Abstract: The Dummy process is used for testing the WPS structure. The process will accept 2 input numbers and will return the XML result with an add one and subtract one operation

ns0:Process.ows:Title: GDALinfo command
ns0:Process.ows:Abstract: GDALinfo command to check image properties

ns0:Process.ows:Title: ncdump command
ns0:Process.ows:Abstract: ncdump returning file header as string or xml. Running basic command ncdump -h file_name, or with extra flag -x

ns0:Process.ows:Title: Answer to Life, the Universe and Everything
ns0:Process.ows:Abstract: Numerical solution that is the answer to Life, Universe and Everything. The process is an improvement to Deep Tought computer (therefore version 2.0) since it no longer takes 7.5 milion years, but only a few seconds to give a response, with an update of status every 10 seconds.

ns0:Process.ows:Title: Geotiff sizer reducer
ns0:Process.ows:Abstract: GDAL and Numpy code that will reduze the dimension of a satelite image by using a mean calculation of values. Test GeoTiff in: http://rsg.pml.ac.uk/wps/sat_image.tif
